column4: How do I navigate to the administrator desktop. I've tried using "cd .." which brings me to the home directory, but I can't seem to get anywhere else
well, this is Linux, so we call it root :)
are you trying to login as root? if so, please read the link here
what 3rd party software? does sudo not do it for you?
and I don't believe you can login as root anyway, unless you set the root pass?
please read the link I gave you, it explains the Linux concept of security :)
i guess you're still in /root, so cd ~/Desktop
San Francisco you are from? cool
its right on the reverse DNS :)
i gather you can figure out where I'm from :P
oh, I thought u were asking a question :P
